TopicTitle: Please ell with nuclear reactors NEAR FUTURE ELECTRICAL

Articles.Content:
Hi!

I have this configuration:

KSP latest, module manager 2.3.4, all "near future" gears.

I've tried anything but still I can't turn on Nuclear reactors... I sent a probe into space or a crew with some pre installed stuff, added commands for the radiators...radiators deploy, but no nuclear reaction...

anyone can help please?
You might want to post that in the Near Future thread; not sure Nertea checks this forum.
